'''Courier's Trial Keystone''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after completing three [[Relay Ball]] puzzles in the [[Ancestral Temple]]. Obtaining all 3 is required to start the {{Quest|To the Night, What is the Night's}}.

# West of the [[Ancestral Temple]] Teleport Waypoint.
